website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality cooking set with enough capacity for a sizable crab boil.
pros: Set includes an 80-quart cook pot with a strainer basket and lid, as well as a 12-quart stock pot with a lid
Constructed of heavy gauge aluminum, with riveted handles
cons: Some reports of this product arriving damaged with dents or warping

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, the lid was dented, the the pot ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the lid was dented, the the pot was warped, and the strainer was a lot smaller than the pot. I was looking forward to using this for a crawfish boil this weekend, but it's not to be. I already sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Norsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Great set for extra large crawfish/seafood boils.
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome if you cook a lot of crawfish, like my boyfriend does.. 30+ pounds. Love that it comes with a smaller pot for when we just do a small boil for us two at home.
customer_reviews.author: sn

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: The pot was much larger than expected. Did a Low Country Boil big enough for 20 people with food left over. Sturdy, lightweight and transfers heat extremely well. Both pots are terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for my crawfish boils. Ideal for a 40lbs sack of crawfish with corn, and potatoes .. 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: MRS. B

customer_reviews.title: Light, strong and holds a lot of food
customer_reviews.text: We use this pot for our seafood boils and steam cooking, large enough for a large get together and very sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Coplin SR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we absolutely love this huge pot;we do a lot of seafood gatherings and this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: S Jones

customer_reviews.title: 80 qt with strainer is NOT what you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 80 qr pot and received a strainer way too small for pot. Large extra space on all sides food would fall into and get trapped. Would only be able to cook amount of crawfish I've been cooking in a 60 qt. Pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Brando

customer_reviews.title: Good pots at great price
customer_reviews.text: Did a lobester boil in their pots and they were great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Loring

customer_reviews.title: Don’t skimp on the burner. Get a big stable one.
customer_reviews.text: Well built sturdy pots and basket. Did a crab boil for 25 people right out of the box. Absolutely flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size, cooked up 20# king crab the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size, cooked up 20# king crab the other night and everyone enjoyed it. I should of bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Cooked boiled peanuts.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bigger than what we imagined. The bonus pot was a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: myra L.

customer_reviews.title: Shrimp boil perfection
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Fed family of 23 with shrimp, potatoes, crab clusters, corn of cob, and polish sausage. All had their fill.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Allen

customer_reviews.title: great product, delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, great product, delivered on time. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For big boils!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge!!! Perfect for our biggest cookouts. (No we won't be cooking the toddler 😂)
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: and we tried it out and loved it! The best part is it comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this for my mom, and we tried it out and loved it! The best part is it comes with a stock pot. Was worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Professional Grade 80 Quart All Purpose Boiling Pot with Basket (3pc) plus a Bonus 12 Quart Stock Pot (2pc) .
product_meta.description: This professional quality 80 quart and heavy aluminum gauge boiling pot gives you the freedom to cook the type of food you want. Be it Seafood boils, Crawfish, Lobsters, Crabs, Tamale, Fish fry, Turkey fry, Gumbo etc this pot handles them all. With its riveted handles on the sides it’s perfectly durable for your fun filled experiences. Comes with a 12 quart stock pot best suited for boiling vegetables, pasta, beans or the type of food you want. Time to enjoy your Backyard parties, Tailgating before a crucial game or enjoy cooking for your customers! (Crawfish Cooker, Crawfish Steamer, Crawfish Boiling pot, Stockpots, Crawfish Cooking pot) Promotional Offer! Reduced price at $125! Sale! Discount! Limited time offer! For Fresh Crawfish Orders visit our Facebook Page https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100015060762533
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL QUALITY Our heavy gauge aluminum boiling pot with strainer basket and lid have riveted handles for strength and durability.

ALL PURPOSE Our large 80 quart boiling pot is perfect for all your recipes. Boiling your fresh Maine Lobsters, Alaskan King Crab Legs, Shrimp, Clams, Mussels and/or Crawfish will be a breeze. Holds up to 45 pounds of your favorite shellfish.

USE IT ANYWHERE Our strong yet lightweight aluminum construction allows you the flexibility to use our cooking pots almost anywhere you can cook. Restaurants, Backyard Parties, Catered Events and even Tailgaters.
ADDED BONUS For a limited time, you'll receive a handy 12 Quart Stock Pot with every boiling pot purchase. It's perfect for your vegetables, potatoes or pastas.

TRUSTED QUALITY We stand behind our products against any manufacturing defects or damage during shipping. If you are not satisfied with our product, return it for an exchange or full refund within 30days of purchase.
